ComicInfo.Summary: A no-name villain buys a toaster and a bunch of guns from an arms dealer. He uses these items to rob a bank and take Marcia Brady hostage. When he uses the toaster it teleports in a bunch of super-villains including Ghengis Kahn, Billy The Kid, and Overtkill. The Deadly Duo, comprised of Kill-Cat and Kid Avenger are tracking down the toaster in question, which leads them to the bank holdup. Marcia Brady decides to use the toaster, which teleports Gen 13's Grunge. He starts a fight with the super-villains, which is quickly joined by the arriving Deadly Duo. With the help of Marcia Brady the team defeat the villains. In a last-ditch effort to save himself the no-name villain attempts to absorb the toaster's power, which causes him to instead disappear. Grunge is then sent home and Marcia Brady is left to answer Kid Avenger's annoying questions.
